resources.string: By Signing up, you agree to the AndhraBasket
This app needs access to your file storage so that it can read photos.
3.You as a customer can cancel your order anytime up to the cut-off time of the slot for which you have placed an order by calling our customer service.
4. All the products listed on the Site will be sold at MRP unless otherwise specified. The prices mentioned at the time of ordering will be the prices charged on the date of the delivery.
5. All our Customers to return the product at the time of delivery if due to some reason they are not satisfied with the quality or freshness of the product.
